sources.title: King Of California
sources.description: An unstable dad who, after getting out of a mental institution, tries to convince his daughter that there's Spanish gold buried somewhere under suburbia.

metadata.Plot: A fresh-out-of-the-mental institution father and his emancipated teenage daughter venture together on a quest for an ancient Spanish treasure buried beneath their local Costco in this take on the modern family and the American dream.
metadata.Actors: Michael Douglas, Evan Rachel Wood, Willis Burks II
